page.title: 15LOCAL PRESS COVERAGE
page.content: For a week we studied the copies of a local area newspaper - The Journal. We found 10 stories of crime, one of which was in Gateshead, a robbery. 12 stories of human interest including one which was directly related to our area as it was about a policewoman who lived at{Eighton Banks}and who was shot wilst on duty in Gateshead over a year ago. There were 9 sport stories, one about the Great North Run which passes through Gateshead. Each day the paper contains the days television programmes and reviews and cartoons, horroscopes, classified adverts and an international news page.One page each day changed, one day it was motoring news, another business news, another day a womans page, followed by farming news and then books. The weather forcast appeared every day. The most important item was on the front page.
